entry.title: From Yessenia: Carlos has worked in restaurants since he first...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

From Yessenia: Carlos has worked in restaurants since he first arrived in the U.S., where he’s been the chef’s right-hand man. Since then, he’s taken a liking to cooking Central American, Mexican, and American cuisine. His wife Yessenia began her career in restaurants washing dishes before moving into food preparation. Three years ago she began selling food from her house, which she does with dedication and love for you all. ❤️

You can support Yessenia, Carlos, and their two ...children by buying food this weekend. Order at tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-11-14. Pickup in Denver, Boulder, & Aurora.

Carlos ha trabajado desde que llegó a Estados Unidos en restaurantes y ha estado de mano derecha de los chefs desde ese tiempo le ha tomado el gusto por cocinar desde comida centroamericana mexicana y americana y Yessenia su esposa empezó lavando platos hasta pasar a preparación en restaurantes hasta hace 3 años que han empezado a vender comida desde su casa y lo an hecho con dedicación y amor para ustedes. ❤️

Se puede apoyar a Yessenia, Carlos, y sus dos hijos por la compra de comida este fin de semana. Ordene aquí: tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-11-14. Hay recogida en Denver, Boulder, y Aurora.

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Yessenia is selling tamales and soup for the family next weekend!...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling tamales and soup for the family next weekend! She’s been involved with Sanctuary4All for over about two years now, is on the board of direct...ors, and has sold pupusas for #SolidarityMeals a few times before. She’s raising money to support her husband’s immigration case. You can place an order at tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-11-14.

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Coloradothe next week it is the solidarity meal for Yessenia and Carlos's family. chicken soup and...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

the next week it is the solidarity meal for Yessenia and Carlos's family. chicken soup and vegetable soup, and tamales. thank you for each time supporting all... the families of sanctuary for all. Thanks to your help, Carlos's family, whose process is still ongoing, can be on their feet, as they continue to fight in the appeal of their case and are awaiting their new court. Vemo @yessenia Martínez-25

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado would also love it if y'all would...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Sanctuary4All Colorado would also love it if y'all would throw some donations Jorge's way! https://www.gofundme.com/f/keep-jorge-with-his-family

Jorge Araiza has been in sanctuary resisting deportation since December of 2019. Jorge is the father of four U.S.-born children and has lived in the U.S. for 21 years. He grew up in Denver, and practically his entire direct family is in Colorado, including his parents, siblings, and his four children. Jorge's youngest child is four years old, and needs his father.

Since Jorge is in sanctuary, he has limited opportunities to work and needs our assistance raising funds for his new lawyer after his previous lawyer unexpectedly abandoned his case in September. If you can donate please do and please share!

entry.title: When Edna first came to a Sanctuary4All meeting, her son was...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

When Edna first came to a Sanctuary4All meeting, her son was still detained at GEO. Just a few weeks ago, he was released from on bond, but he’s still fighting a deportation case. The two of them have been attending meetings together, and now they’re raising money to help pay for his legal representation by selling enchiladas this weekend. You can support by ordering at tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-11-7
